verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H94>Agur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3348>Jakeh,<s%> the <S%H9294>oracle.<s%> The <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H5002>declares<s%> to <S%H384>Ithiel,<s%> to <S%H384>Ithiel<s%> and Ucal: <S%H401><s%>
<S%H3588>Surely<s%> I am <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H1198>stupid<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> And I do not have the <S%H998>understanding<s%> of a <S%H120>man.<s%>
<S%H3808>Neither<s%> have I <S%H3925>learned<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> do I <S%H3045>have<s%> the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One.<s%>

<S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H5927>ascended<s%> into <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H3381>descended<s%>? <S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H622>gathered<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> in His <S%H2651>fists<s%>? <S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H9503>wrapped<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> in His <S%H8071>garment<s%>? <S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H6965>established<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>? <S%H4100>What<s%> is His <S%H8034>name<s%> or His son's <S%H8034>name<s%>? <S%H3588>Surely<s%> you <S%H3045>know!<s%>
<S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H565>word<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> is <S%H6884>tested;<s%> He is a <S%H4043>shield<s%> to those who <S%H2620>take<s%> <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in Him.
Do not <S%H3254>add<s%> to His <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H6435>Lest<s%> He <S%H3198>reprove<s%> you, and you be <S%H3576>proved<s%> a <S%H3576>liar.<s%>
<S%H8147>Two<s%> <S%H8147>things<s%> I <S%H7592>asked<s%> of Thee, Do not <S%H4513>refuse<s%> me <S%H2962>before<s%> I die: <S%H4191><s%>

<S%H7368>Keep<s%> <S%H7723>deception<s%> and <S%H3577>lies<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from me, <S%H5414>Give<s%> me <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H7389>poverty<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H6239>riches;<s%> <S%H2963>Feed<s%> me with the <S%H3899>food<s%> that is my <S%H2706>portion,<s%>

<S%H6435>Lest<s%> I be <S%H7646>full<s%> and <S%H3584>deny<s%> [Thee] and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4310>"Who<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>?" Or <S%H6435>lest<s%> I be in <S%H3423>want<s%> and <S%H1589>steal,<s%> And <S%H8610>profane<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of my <S%H430>God.<s%>
Do not <S%H3960>slander<s%> a <S%H5650>slave<s%> to his <S%H113>master,<s%> <S%H6435>Lest<s%> he <S%H7043>curse<s%> you and you be <S%H816>found<s%> <S%H816>guilty.<s%>
There is a <S%H1755>kind<s%> of [man] who <S%H7043>curses<s%> his father, And does not <S%H1>bless<s%> his <S%H1288>mother.<s%>
There is a <S%H1755>kind<s%> who is <S%H2889>pure<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> Yet is not <S%H7364>washed<s%> from his <S%H6675>filthiness.<s%>
There is a <S%H1755>kind<s%> â€“ oh <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H7311>lofty<s%> are his <S%H5869>eyes!<s%> And his <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> are <S%H5375>raised<s%> [in arrogance.]

There is a <S%H1755>kind<s%> of [man] whose <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are [like] <S%H2719>swords,<s%> And his <S%H4973>jaw<s%> <S%H4973>teeth<s%> [like] <S%H3979>knives,<s%> To <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> from the <S%H776>earth,<s%> And the <S%H34>needy<s%> from among <S%H120>men.<s%>

The <S%H5936>leech<s%> has <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> <S%H3051>"Give,<s%>" <S%H3051>"Give.<s%>" <S%H1992>There<s%> are <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7969>things<s%> that will not be <S%H7646>satisfied,<s%> <S%H702>Four<s%> that will not <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1952>"Enough<s%>":

<S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> and the <S%H6115>barren<s%> <S%H7358>womb,<s%> <S%H776>Earth<s%> that is <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H4325>water,<s%> And <S%H784>fire<s%> that <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H1952>"Enough.<s%>"

The <S%H5869>eye<s%> that <S%H3932>mocks<s%> a father, And <S%H1>scorns<s%> <S%H936><s%> a <S%H3349>mother,<s%> The <S%H517>ravens<s%> of the <S%H6158>valley<s%> will <S%H5158>pick<s%> it out, And the <S%H5365>young<s%> <S%H1121>eagles<s%> will <S%H5404>eat<s%> it.
<S%H1992>There<s%> are <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7969>things<s%> which are <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> for me, <S%H702>Four<s%> which I do not understand: <S%H3045><s%>

The <S%H1870>way<s%> of an <S%H5404>eagle<s%> in the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> The <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> on a <S%H6697>rock,<s%> The <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H591>ship<s%> in the <S%H3820>middle<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> And the <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H1397>man<s%> with a <S%H5959>maid.<s%>

<S%H3651>This<s%> is the <S%H1870>way<s%> of an <S%H5003>adulterous<s%> <S%H802>woman:<s%> She <S%H398>eats<s%> and <S%H4229>wipes<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> And <S%H559>says,<s%> "I have <S%H6466>done<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H205>wrong.<s%>"

<S%H8478>Under<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7969>things<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7264>quakes,<s%> And <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H702>four,<s%> it <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5375>bear<s%> up:
<S%H8478>Under<s%> a <S%H5650>slave<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H4427>becomes<s%> <S%H4427>king,<s%> And a <S%H5036>fool<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he is <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H3899>food,<s%>

<S%H8478>Under<s%> an <S%H8130>unloved<s%> woman <S%H3588>when<s%> she <S%H1166>gets<s%> a <S%H1166>husband,<s%> And a <S%H8198>maidservant<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> she <S%H3423>supplants<s%> her <S%H1404>mistress.<s%>
<S%H702>Four<s%> <S%H702>things<s%> are <S%H6996>small<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> But they are <S%H2449>exceedingly<s%> wise: <S%H2450><s%>
The <S%H5244>ants<s%> are not a <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H5971>folk,<s%> But they <S%H3559>prepare<s%> their <S%H3899>food<s%> in the <S%H7019>summer;<s%>
The <S%H9627>badgers<s%> are not <S%H6099>mighty<s%> <S%H5971>folk,<s%> Yet they <S%H7760>make<s%> their <S%H1004>houses<s%> in the <S%H5553>rocks;<s%>
The <S%H697>locusts<s%> <S%H369>have<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4428>king,<s%> Yet <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H3318>go<s%> out in <S%H2686>ranks;<s%>
The <S%H8079>lizard<s%> you may <S%H8610>grasp<s%> with the <S%H3027>hands,<s%> Yet it is in kings' <S%H1964>palaces.<s%>

<S%H1992>There<s%> are <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7969>things<s%> which are <S%H3190>stately<s%> in [their] <S%H6806>march,<s%> Even <S%H702>four<s%> which are <S%H3190>stately<s%> when they walk: <S%H1980><s%>
The <S%H3918>lion<s%> [which] is <S%H1368>mighty<s%> among <S%H929>beasts<s%> And does not <S%H7725>retreat<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3605>any,<s%>
The <S%H2223>strutting<s%> <S%H4975><s%> <S%H4975>cock,<s%> the <S%H8495>male<s%> <S%H8495>goat<s%> <S%H176>also,<s%> And a <S%H4428>king<s%> [when his] <S%H510>army<s%> is with him.

<S%H518>If<s%> you have <S%H9310>been<s%> <S%H9310>foolish<s%> in <S%H5375>exalting<s%> yourself Or <S%H518>if<s%> you have <S%H2161>plotted<s%> [evil, put your] <S%H3027>hand<s%> on your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

For the <S%H4330>churning<s%> of <S%H2461>milk<s%> <S%H3318>produces<s%> <S%H2529>butter,<s%> And <S%H4330>pressing<s%> the <S%H639>nose<s%> <S%H3318>brings<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H1818>blood;<s%> So the <S%H4330>churning<s%> of <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H3318>produces<s%> <S%H7379>strife.<s%>
